C I N

C

CheckContent - Annotation Type in com.righettod.security.annotation
Define annotation to validate content of a string, elements below are checked:
Character continuous repetition Character list against characters whitelist Not others check like range,max,min length,... are implemented because there others existing annotations that can do the job (see link below).
CheckContentValidator - Class in com.righettod.security.annotation.validator
Implementation of the validator performing processing for annotation "CheckContent".
CheckContentValidator() - Constructor for class com.righettod.security.annotation.validator.CheckContentValidator
 
com.righettod.security.annotation - package com.righettod.security.annotation
 
com.righettod.security.annotation.validator - package com.righettod.security.annotation.validator

initialize(CheckContent) - Method in class com.righettod.security.annotation.validator.CheckContentValidator

N

NoTag - Annotation Type in com.righettod.security.annotation
Define annotation to validate content of a string, check that the string contains no HTML/XML tags
NoTagValidator - Class in com.righettod.security.annotation.validator
Implementation of the validator performing processing for annotation "NoTag".
NoTagValidator() - Constructor for class com.righettod.security.annotation.validator.NoTagValidator
